ome java module?

Yes, Heritri=
x comes with its own (patched) HTTPClient implementation.
Is there a way to=
 override tomcats httpclient in this case, or should i run heritrix on anot=
her server to avoid conflict?
When i put patched httpClient in tomcat commo=
n lib dir i get DNS error, when its in webapp lib dir i get nosuchmethoderr=
or(setCookieMap).

 From: Bjarne Anderse=
n <bja@...>
To: "archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com" <archive-=
crawler@yahoogroups.com> 
Sent: Monday, May 6, 2013 11:57 AM
Subject: SV: [=
archive-crawler] Embed Heritrix 1.14.4.
 

Heritrix comes with its own (pat=
ched) HTTPClient implementation as far as I remember. So running inside a t=
omcat you might have conflicting libs ?

best
Bjarne Andersen
Netarchive.dk=
